data.name: Domain:ExcursionUpdateWhenNotDraftError
data.value: Excursion can be updated when status is draft.

data.name: Domain:ExcursionBookWhenNotPublishedError
data.value: Excursion can be booked when status is published.

data.name: Domain:ExcursionBookPlacesCountLimitError
data.value: Excursion can be booked when excursion has places left.

data.name: Domain:ExcursionApproveBookingWhenNotPublishedError
data.value: Booking can be approved when excursion status is published.

data.name: Domain:ExcursionApproveBookingNotFoundError
data.value: Failed to approve booking for tourist with id {0}.

data.name: Domain:ExcursionRejectBookingWhenNotPublishedError
data.value: Booking can be rejected when excursion status is published.

data.name: Domain:BookingApproveWhenNotBookedError
data.value: Booking can be approved when status is booked.

data.name: Domain:BookingRejectWhenNotBookedError
data.value: Booking can be rejected when status is booked.

data.name: Domain:ExcursionRejectBookingNotFoundError
data.value: Failed to reject booking for tourist with id {0}.

data.name: Validation:ExcursionNameNotEmptyError
data.value: Excursion name should not be empty.

data.name: Validation:ExcursionNameMaximumLengthError
data.value: Excursion name should be less than or equal to 64.

data.name: Validation:ExcursionDescriptionMaximumLengthError
data.value: Excursion description should be less than or equal to 512.

data.name: Validation:ExcursionDateTimeUtcNotDefaultError
data.value: Excursion date should not be empty.

data.name: Validation:ExcursionPlacesCountGreaterThanError
data.value: Excursion places count should be greater than 0.

data.name: Validation:ExcursionPlacesCountLessThanOrEqualToError
data.value: Excursion places count should be less than or equal to 10.

data.name: Validation:ExcursionPricePerPlaceGreaterThanError
data.value: Excursion price per place should be greater than 0.

data.name: Domain:ExcursionBookWhenTouristAlreadyBookedError
data.value: Excursion can be booked only once.
